document_data.name: ''Pick of Piercing''
document_data.Powers: These ''+1 picks'' were capable of destroying [[magic]]al constructs made of [[force]]. These included, but were not limited to the effects created by [[spell]]s like ''[[Bigby's hand]]'' or ''[[wall of force]]''
document_data.Creation: ''Picks of piercing'' were  crafted with the casting of a ''[[disintegrate]]'' spell.
